results.title: Analyzing the Impact of Artificial Intelligence on Theology
results.summary: Sean Oâ€™Callaghan and Paul Hoffman discuss the theological implications of AI and their book, "AI Shepherds and Electric Sheep." They explore AI's impact on learning and theology, noting the potential for machines to replace human deliberation. This raises concerns about reliance on technology over scriptural understanding and discernment (2 Timothy 3:7). Readers should critically evaluate AI's influence in light of God's word.
